Pre-Game Insights: Iceland is hungry for revenge after losing to Montenegro in a 2021 friendly.
Iceland recently lost to Netherlands in a friendly match, while Montenegro also faced a loss against Georgia.
Key players to watch include Iceland's Hakon Haraldsson and Montenegro's Stefan Savic and Stevan Jovetic.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Iceland has a rich history of international football success, narrowly missing World Cup qualification in 2014 but excelling at Euro 2016.
Others: Betting tips and other football predictions are mentioned as additional features.
